div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Aberdene Tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxjo die mensis
februarij anno quo supra

The said day mastir Alexander Setoun' presentit ane lettir of our souerane
lordis vndir the signet to gilbert menyeis prowest James collisone and'
Walter cullane bailyeis chargeand' thame defend of ane land' bocht
fra george tailyeour and marioun' Duncansone his spous' quhill he be
ordourlie put thar fray and askit Instrument of me ser Johne stirueling'
tharapon' Befor the witnes Johne leslie of Wardris Dauid andirsone
mastir gavane leslie patrik chernsid' mastir george tongiltoun'
and Richerd Waus

The said day Wilyame skynner' wes conuict be ane suorne'
assis' mathow branche forspekar for tribulance of Androw burnet for
the quhilk he wes in ane amerciament of the court et cetera And the said Androw quyt
of all tribulance of him

The said' day It wes fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne' assis'
mathow branche forspekar that Richerd litster laid vnpandit till
Androw litster ane peis' of one littit claith in wed of v s'

The said day henry red laucfullie warnit callit and nocht
comperit till haue ansuerit to the borgh' fundin one him be mathow
branche and Johne craik for the releving of thame of vj stanis
of woll and ane half at the handis of Symone Ellone' tharfor the
bailyeis chargeit gilbert prestoun' officiar' to pas' and tak ane
stres' of the said henry and lat It to borgh' agane gife It be
askit and warne him agane tuysday the xxv day of this
Instant monetht of februar to ansuer' to the said borgh' as ferd'
day of proces'

The said day mastir alexander Setoun' vicar of bothelny producit and'
presentit to gilbert Menyeis prouest James collisone and Walter
Cullane tua of the bailyeis of Aberdene' ane lettir of our souerane lordis vndir
the signet of the deliuerance of the lordis of our' souerane lodis counsall
to keip and defend' him in his peciable' possessioun' of ane tenement bocht
be the said mastir Alexander fra Marioun' Duncansone with consent of george
tailyeour hir spous liand' in the vuirkirkgait of Aberdene' eftir the forme'
of his Infeftment and askit thame till Indors' the samyne and deliuer
thame agane' to him eftir the tenour of the said lettrez'

The said day Duncane fyf and Alexander Kyntor pretendit serreffis to our Souerane'
lordis lettrez' as thai allegit askit ane pretendit act' maid' befor the said' pro
uest and bailyeis concernyng the said mastir Alexanderis tenement to put the
samyne till execucioun' and schew Nocht our' souerane lordis lettrez' tharapone'
that tyme' Nochtwithstanding the said' Mastir Alexander setoun' for him self and
as procuratour to the saidis Marioun' Duncansone and george tailyeour hir
spous' fand' ane borgh' in the handis of Williame scrymgeour ane of the
officiaris of the said' burgh' In this maner as eftir followis I master
Alexander Setoun' for my self as fear of ane forland' and tenement
vmquhile pertenand' to Marioun' Duncansone and as procuratour'
to the said george and Marioun' fyndis ane borgh' in your' hand William
scrymgeour ane of the seruandis of the said burgh' that ane pretendit
act' concernyng the forsaid' land' and' tenement pertenyng to me here
tablie be chartour and' sesing maid befor the prouost and ballies
of Aberdene the sext day of the monetht' of August the yeir' of god'
ane thousand' fyve hundreth' and ten' yeris aucht nocht to be put
till execucioun' becaus' of my Infeftment and' possessioun' vnder
James Collisoun' Sele ane of the bailyeis of the said' burgh' The
quhilk wes producit in Jugement and for certane Juris' lawis and
resonis that I as procuratour to the saidis Marioun' and george producit
in Jugement the thrid day of februar ande for vthiris lawis and reso
nis gife neid beis to be producit detfull tyme and' place and'
als' becaus' I producit our souerane lordis lettrez to keip me in possession'
of the said forland and tenement and tharto I fynd' ane borgh'
in thi hand officiar forsaid' And als' I fynd ane borgh' to fors' that borgh'
becaus' It wes nocht recounterit'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxv die
mensis februarij anno quo supra

head.add: assignacio pecuniaris pro libertate burgensis et amerciamentis forestallaris fabrice pretorij

div.p:
The saide day the prouest balyeis and Counsale assignit ale Some
of money that happinnis to be gottin of forstallaris and for the making
of burges and brethir of gild to the reperacioun' and bigin of the tolbutht
ay and quhile it be deulie bigit and reformit

The saide day gilbert menyeis prouost band him to pay to Symone
ellone aucht stane of wole at this next beltane Ande henry red' oblist
him be his hand to releiwe the prouost of v petir mathou branche ane
stane Johne craik j stane and henry Rede ane stane of wole et cetera

The said' day thome vmfray lauchfullie warnit Callit and nocht comperit
tile ansuer at the Instance of James lidaile in the thingis that he hed'
to say to him was in Amerciament of the court et cetera nochtwithstanding the said'
James offerit him redy tile ansuer to ale thingis that the said' thomas
hed' to say to him befor the prouost and balyeis his Juge ordinar

The said day thome of towy wes conuict' be ane suorne assis' ser Johne
Ruthirfurd forspekar for tribulance of patry merky for the quhilk he wes
in ane amerciament of the court et cetera and the said patry for tribulance of the
said thomas and ilkane till amend till vthir as law will

Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure gilberti meyeis Anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo
decimo

Willelmus Wat quia sponsauit Relictam burgensis recipitur
in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Soluto duabus marcis et prestito solito
Juramento
Johannes Mair' in tulykery recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde solutis quadraginta solidis et prestito Solito Juramento
Robertus chepman Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito
Juramento et Soluto v s' in alba bursa
Alexander blinsele recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Jura paternitatis prestito
Solito Juramento et Solutis quinque s' in alba bursa

Cura balliuorum burgi de Aberdene' Tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvjo die mensis
februarij Anno quo supra

The said day Androu gordoun' wes conuict' be thir personis vndir writtin that Is to
say patry leslie Duncan fyf Johane blak Wilyeame Kyntor' patry Rede Wil
yeame murray george Bisset Johne' Kyntor' Wilyeame Wormet Androu
meldrum Dauid Kyntor Alexander Kyntor Malcolme' crag Adam fyf Alexander
Nory chosin and suorne in ane' assis' for tribulance of Mastir Dauy
nicholsone' in word' for the quhilkis he wes in amerciament of the court and till
amend as law will and forber' In tyme to cum et cetera And the said' mastir
Dauy quyt of all tribulance of him

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimoseptimo
die mensis februarij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day thome bryde cordonare grantit him to pay to ser Johnne litster
chaplane of sanct crispin and crispinianies alter yerlie iiij s' iiij d eftir the
tenour of the said ser Johnez' euidencis maid tharapone and to pay iiij s' and d'
of the termes of Witsonday and mertymes bigane

head.add: Cordonaris the chesin of the deknys and serchearis of the werk

div.p:
Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vltimo
die mensis februarij Anno quo supra

The said day the court wardit schew for law and it was gevin for
dome be the moutht of Wilyeame fynne dempstar of the samyn that
Richerd hennersone litstar had failyeit in his preif as day and terme assignit
to him be his avin consent quhar he tuk to preve that Johne of mar' and Johnne
colisone had' skathit him the setting of thre fattis of wad extending'
to xij pundis et cetera ffor the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court and
thai quyt of his chalang

The said day Johnne colisoun' tuk him to preve one monunday that nixt cummys
that Johnne of murray and his seruandis with his pleucht had wranguisly
manurit and occupyit erit ane part if his land extedning to ane pek of
beir sawin be estimacioun'

The said day Androu scot oblist him be the faitht of his bodie to content
and pay to Agnes Kintor the wif of Johnne red' hatmakar' xxv s'
scottis money within yeir and day hereftir

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem tercio die
mensis marcij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day gilbert' Tulidef was conuict' be ane suorne assis'
mathou branche forspekar for the strulance of Robert crak sangstar
for the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court and till amend as law
will and forber in tyme tocum And the amendis tharof referrit to the
prouost and counsall one friday that nixt cummys

Curia balliuorum de aberdene' tenta In pretorio eiusdem septimo die
mensis marcij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo decimo

Eodem die Willelmus Wormet deuenit plegius legalis quod Willelmus howlet gallicus
erit indempnes pro Nicholaio Wilyeant gallico super terram aliter quam per viam
Juris Et Willelmus Warroket magister Nauis deuenit plegius quod dictus
Willelmus howlet erit Indemones pro dicto nicholio super mare aliter quam per
viam juris Et Willelmus riddale gallicus deuenit plegius legalis
quod dictus nicholaus Wilyeant erit Indempnes pro dicto Willelmo howlet
super terram et super mare aliter quam per viam Juris Et vtraque obligantur ad
conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de huismodi fideiussione

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' mathow branche
forspekar that thai coud' nocht acquit Williame Wobstar of
the Spilling of ane pece of bogtanny clath pertening to alexander
moresone and his spous' for the quhilk he was in Amerciament of the
court and aw to Amend' the skatht done tharto and that was gevin for
dome

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimoseptimo
die mensis marcij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo decimo

The said day Johne ramsay grantit him borgh' for to Androw
stratoun' for xvj s' and vj d' quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of law

The said day Dauid couper tuk him to prewe one friday that nixt cummys
that Johnne hill is his feit seruand and prentis'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxj die
mensis marcij anno quo supra

The saide day comperit William futhes ande deliuerit to Robert chapman
sone and ayr tile vmquhile thomas chapman ane Instrument of Sesin
and entires' of ale his landis

The said' day the prouest and balyeis chargit gilbert prestone officiar'
to pas' and charge thomas meldrum and his spous' to deliuer tile
Alexander Riche the clatht that thai hed fra him or emples' tharfor and
gif thai wile nocht to warne thame to Comper befor tham one mo
nunday the xxiiij day of marche tile ansuer at the Instance of the
said' alexander Roche

The said' day Alexander nory lauchfullie Callit warne and nocht comperit
was in Amerciament of the court tile haue ansuerd' at the Instance of
Alexander burnat et cetera

The said day the prouost and bailyeis continew the opnyng of the witnes
betuix Dauid coupar and Johnne hill to monunday that nixt cummys and ordanit
the said Dauid' to produce mair witnes the said day

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die mensis marcij
anno quo Supra

The said' day Alexander nory grauntit him avand' viij s' an iiij d' to
be pat within terme of law tile alexander burnat

The said' day the Court wardit schew for law and' It was
gevin for dome that Dauid Coupar hed' preuit Sufficientlie that
Jonhne hill was feit seruand' to him for iiijor yeris

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo octauo die mensis marcij Anno dominj et cetera quingentesimo vndecimo

The said day the balyeis assignit monunday that nixt cummys to Duncan'
Wandy till ansuer to the complaynt of marioun' Doris the relict of vmquhil
Wilyeame philp with the strintht of ane borgh' for the wranguis' withhaldin
fra hir of thre elne of clath price vj s' viiij d' the elne othir of croy clath
or brownn' gray and xl s' of maile

The said patry Walcar one that ane part and Johnne fynne cordoner one
that vthir part oblist thame be thar handis vphaldin but ony reuocacioun'
to stand'and abid' at the deliuerance of Johnne andersone and Symon'
elloun' anent all debatis betuix thame and' in speciale of ane pece of
clath

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vltimo die
mensis marcij anno Millesimo quingentesimo vndecimo

The said day It was sufficient preuit be diuers' suorne personis that William
pathonsone quhitfischear is awand' and suld' deliuere to Johnne of cullane
thre keling and' ane leyng quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of law

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Aberdene vltimo die mensis marcij Anno
Dominj millesimo quingentesimo vndecimo coram honorabilibus viris Johanne
mar et Waltero cullane duobus balliuorum burgj de Aberdene In pretorio
eiusdem in curia balliuorum pro tribunali sedenti per subscriptum videlicet Johannem ruthirfurd'
militem Johannem cullan Johannem colison' patricium leslie robertum crag patricium
Reid' Johannem andersone alexandrum malysone gavinum murray Willelmum Wormet
Andream lousone andream meldrum andream stratoun' burgensis dictj
burgj Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannis Robertsone' pater Willelmi
robertsone latoris presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et sasitus vt de feodo ad
pacem et fidem domini nostrj regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum
burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eisudem vicj inter terram patricium
chernsid' ex australi ex vna et terram thome Watsone ex boreali partibus
ab altera et communiones vias regias versus occidens et oriens Et quod dictus
Willelmus est legittimus et propinquior heres dictj quondam Johannis patris
suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra
cum pertinenciis valent nunc per annum quadraginta solidos Et valuit duas
marcas tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de supremo domino nostro rege
per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus dominj nostri regis per
puram et simplicem renunciacionem de dimissionem mariote balcromy relicte
quondam dictj Johannes coniunctam infeodacionem eiusdem habens in Instans die
factam datis et clausis

The saide day thomas Watsone burges of the said' burgh bande and oblist him
be his vphaldin and fatht of his bodie to marioun' balcromy the relict of vmquhile
Jonhne robertsone in taruas to mak hir be put in lauchfule sesin and coniunctfeftment of the
haile lande of the saide Johnez' liand in the gallougat one the est part of the samyn
gat betuix the land of patry chernsid' one the southt part the land of the saide
thomas one the northt part the kingis gatis one the est and west partis betuix this and the
fest of Inuencioun' of the croice next hereftir follouing with Dauid fynne hir spois' And'
gif he happinnis to falye tharintil to pay to the said' marioun' fourtj pundis scottis
money becaus of the Renunciand and dimission' of his coniunctfeftment of the said land
maid' within the tolbutht of the said burghe in plane Court to caus' William Robertsone
Sone and ayr to the said' vmquhile Jonhne be lauchfullie entirit tharto Ande Dauid fynne
and mastir John gallouay band' and oblist thame coniunctlie and Seueralie tile obserue and
keip the said' thomas skathles and fre of the said' band' be the fathtis of thar bodiis but
fraud or gile one this wis' the said mastir Jonhne oblist him to freitht the said'
thomas of this band' and to mak Dauid fynne be put in lauchfule sesin of the
said' land' et cetera And the said Dauid oblist him to put his saide Spous' with him in coniunct
feftment with him in the said' lande as said' Is but fraude or gile

The saide day It was fundin ande deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Jonhne Colisone
forspekar that William scrogis salbe putt Jonhne Cullanis half neth' of the Raik
agane togiddir with Androw fyffis half nethis

The said' day Jonhne of mar' ane of the balyeis of abirdene grauntit him resauit
be the handis of Walter cullan ane of the ballieis of the said' burghe'
ane stik of chamlate price fiwe pundis In part of pament of his fadir
Androwe Cullanis waltir maile of his half nethis of the Raik and of his
avne demy neth maile of the mydching of this Instant yer' JM Vc ande
alevin yeris

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvj die mensis aprilis
anno quo supra

Eodem die Duncanus gilrutht conuictus fuit per assiam Juratam ex ore Johannis
ruthirfude prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio alexandri burnat Et Idem alexander conuictus pro perturbio
dicti Duncanj Igitur quilibet eorum fuit in Amerciamento Curie et alter alteri emendabit ut
Jura volunt

Eodem die andreas stratone deuenit plegius legalis quod Duncanus gilrutht erit Indempnis
pro alexandro burnat aliter quam per viam Juris Et Johannes ramsay deuenit plegius legalis quod
dictus alexander burnat erit Indempnis pro dicto Duncano aliter quam per viam Juris ac pro Willelmus
gray aliter quam per viam Juris erit Indempnes pro dicto Duncano et quilibet eorum obli
gatur ad conseruandum suo plegios Indempnes et cetera
